name: azure-diagrams
description: Produces workshop-focused architecture and migration diagrams.
---

# Workshop Diagram Skill

## When to Use

- Visualize challenge flow or migration waves
- Update facilitator target architecture visuals
- Create participant-safe diagrams without solution leakage

## Preferred Diagram Types

- Migration wave timeline
- Current vs target architecture
- Dependency maps for sequencing decisions

## Constraints

- Keep diagrams aligned with CAF Migrate language.
- Use clear labels and avoid low-value decorative elements.
